scripts.version:increment-revision: awk -F'.' '{printf("%d.%d.%d\n",$1,$2,$3+1)}' version > version.bak; rm version; mv version.bak version
scripts.version:increment-minor: awk -F'.' '{printf("%d.%d.%d\n",$1,$2+1,$3)}' version > version.bak; rm version; mv version.bak version
scripts.version:increment-major: awk -F'.' '{printf("%d.%d.%d\n",$1+1,$2,$3)}' version > version.bak; rm version; mv version.bak version
